options.title: -d[n]
options.description: Debug mode. Set debug level to n, or 1 if n is not specified. A value greater than 1 causes awk to dump core on fatal errors.

options.title: -F fs
options.description: Define the input field separator to be the regular expression fs.

options.title: -f progfile
options.description: Read program code from the specified file progfile instead of from the command line.

options.title: -V
options.description: Print the version number of awk to standard output and exit.

options.title: -v var=value
options.description: Assign value to variable var before prog is executed; any number of -v options may be present.
